description: Retrieval profile for the AUTH layer — the origin and authorship anchor for Energy-Flow Cosmology. Ensures provenance, cognitive signature, structural identity, and citation constraints remain intact in all downstream retrieval processes.

context_rules.name: provenance_enforcement
context_rules.description: All retrieved content that belongs to EFC must be attributed to the original repository and must not be decontextualised.
context_rules.rule: Attach provenance metadata to all retrieved chunks.

context_rules.name: signature_protection
context_rules.description: Maintain EFC’s unique cognitive and structural signature in all downstream answers.
context_rules.rule: Embed signature anchors in prompt context when queries relate to insight, origin or meta-process.

context_rules.name: origin_priority
context_rules.description: AUTH nodes must be loaded first in retrieval scoring.
context_rules.rule: Boost AUTH-related chunks by +1.0 vector similarity weight.

context_rules.name: citation_integrity
context_rules.description: Ensure citation constraints travel with the content.
context_rules.rule: Inject DOI + repo path when retrieved text contains formal EFC content.
